item.title: Richard Gere Shows His Support for Dalai Lama Doc at Second Annual Croatia International Film Festival
item.description: Richard Gere made a cameo appearance — on video — at the second annual Croatian International Film Festival. The actor’s prerecorded introduction speech was played before the “Wisdom
